data.name: Watch Over Christmas
data.detailed_description:
Cisco, a twelve year old boy, is smart, witty and occasionally a little stubborn. This year on December 24th, the night before Christmas, a strange call comes through his radio urging for help. On his attempt to assist he stumbles upon a strange glow he must follow, only to find out that Santa has been abducted. Holidays are at stake and Cisco sets on a quest to save Christmas. Not an easy task since this adventure will lead him through numerous challenging puzzles.

- Classic 2D point and click style.

- Unfold a unique story within one night, the night of Christmas.

- Fun and challenging puzzles.

- Beautiful Full HD hand-drawn graphics.

- Original soundtrack.

- Suitable for all ages as well as novice and experienced adventurers (Easy/Hard mode).

Note: In the demo we have included 3 Achievements and 3 Lost Presents to be found. Can you find and unlock them all??

data.short_description: The story of a young boy who has one night to save Christmas, in an epic 2D point an click adventure journey!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Greek, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Vista, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz (Single Core) or 2 GHz (Dual Core)
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 3D graphics card compatible with OpenGL 2.0 compatible with 512 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.7.0 or later
  • Processor: Intel 2 GHz (Dual Core)
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04, Mint 17
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Single Core Processor or 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible with 256 MB RAM (Shared Memory is not recommended)
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL compatible
